document_data.name: Spiceroot
document_data.mainbody: '''Spiceroot''' was a root used in cooking on the [[Sword Coast North]]. It was gathered in [[Neverwinter Wood]] and was notable for its [[spicy]] taste.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Jingo Rummage]], a [[halfling]] [[adventurer]], gathered forest herbs in Neverwinter Wood when his companion [[Jodri]] was eaten by wild wolf-men. As revenge, Jingo asked a group of Neverwintan adventurers to gather [[umber leaves]], [[spotted mushroom]]s, and spiceroots to add them to the wolves' cooking pots. The aroma attracted hungry [[ogre]]s to the camp, who, in turn, slaughtered the beast-men.
